customer_addr:
759 E END MOUNTAIN RD
MILL HALL, PA 17751

citations.narrative:
The temperature in the guinea pig housing facility near the wall heater was 60 degrees F or above, as measured with a
kestrel, but the temperature furthest from the heater was approximately 55.2 degrees F. There were 2 windows open a
small amount and the facility representative stated the garage door had been left partially open.
Guinea pigs kept in ambient temperatures that are too low may be subject to cold stress that may cause discomfort and
predispose them to developing other health issues.
The ambient temperature in indoor housing facilities for guinea pigs must not fall below 60 degrees F.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.26(a)  Repeat
   
Facilities, indoor. 
The temperature in the guinea pig housing facility near the wall heater was 60 degrees F or above, as measured with a 
kestrel, but the temperature furthest from the heater was approximately 55.2 degrees F. There were 2 windows open a 
small amount and the facility representative stated the garage door had been left partially open. 
Guinea pigs kept in ambient temperatures that are too low may be subject to cold stress that may cause discomfort and 
predispose them to developing other health issues. 
The ambient temperature in indoor housing facilities for guinea pigs must not fall below 60 degrees F. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
